title: Drawing, "Adoration of the Shepherds; Arcangle St. Michael after Raphael; St. Margarite after Raphael; Aloof de Wignancourt by Caravaggio; Putti; Study of the Flood; Verso: Disposition after Volterra; St. Ceclia after Raphael; Portion of Marriage of Henry IV to...", 1803–09
medium: Pen and dark brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Adoration of the Shepherds; Arcangle St. Michael after Raphael; St. Margarite after Raphael; Aloof de Wignancourt by Caravaggio; Putti; Study of the Flood; Verso: Disposition after Volterra; St. Ceclia after Raphael; Portion of Marriage of Henry IV to Marie de' Medici after Rubens.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Adoration of the Shepherds; Arcangle St. Michael after Raphael; St. Margarite after Raphael; Aloof de Wignancourt by Caravaggio; Putti; Study of the Flood; Verso: Disposition after Volterra; St. Ceclia after Raphael; Portion of Marriage of Henry IV to...", 1803–09.
1803–09. Pen and dark brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2689.
